invalid_code.title: Invalid verification code
invalid_code.description: The verification code does not exist in this election. Please try voting again, or contact the election officials for further help.

invalid_code.title: Invalid tracking code
invalid_code.description: Please check that the tracking code was entered correctly. The code is case sensitive. If you are checking to make sure your ballot was recorded correctly before submitting, use the ballot check site instead. Still having problems? Contact your local election official.

SegmentsConfigItem.author: Election Official
SegmentsConfigItem.info: The election official has configured the segments that is publicized about the voters.

SpoilRequestItem.author: Voter
SpoilRequestItem.info: A voter has tested his vote to verify the integrity of the system.

ExtractionConfirmationItem.author: Trustees
ExtractionConfirmationItem.info: Confirmation item indicating that the Trustees decrypted the votes in the previous extraction intent item.

ExtractionIntentItem.author: Election Official
ExtractionIntentItem.info: Election official intents to extract and decrypt votes. Following items will confirm if this has happened successfully.

VotingRoundConfigItem.author: Election Official
VotingRoundConfigItem.info: A voting round has been configured

ElectionConfigItem.author: Election Official
ElectionConfigItem.info: The election information has been updated

ThresholdConfigItem.author: Trustee
ThresholdConfigItem.info: Ballot encryption key has been generated

CastRequestItem.author: Voter
CastRequestItem.info: A ballot has been cast and received

BallotCryptogramsItem.author: Voter
BallotCryptogramsItem.info: Voter and Digital Ballot Box have exchanged cryptographic information establishing trust.

BoardEncryptionCommitmentItem.author: Digital Ballot Box
BoardEncryptionCommitmentItem.info: Voter and Digital Ballot Box have exchanged cryptographic information establishing trust.

VoterEncryptionCommitmentItem.author: Voter
VoterEncryptionCommitmentItem.info: Voter and Digital Ballot Box have exchanged cryptographic information establishing trust.

ballot_activity_list.title: Activity connected to the tracking code

AffidavitRejectItem.author: Election Official
AffidavitRejectItem.details: Your affidavit has been rejected. Please contact your Election Officials office to cure your affidavit.

SpoilRequestItem.author: You
SpoilRequestItem.info: You have challenged the integrity of the voting system and performed the Benaloh challenge.

AffidavitAcceptItem.author: Election Official
AffidavitAcceptItem.details: Your affidavit has been accepted. A new item will appear here when it has been extracted for tallying.

VoterSessionItem.author: You
VoterSessionItem.details: You have authenticated your self and signed in.

inprogress.title: Pairing code
inprogress.info: Go to the voting application and confirm this pairing code match the one displayed there. Then follow the instructions in the voting application.

spoiled.title: Your vote has been opened
spoiled.description: Below you will find your decrypted vote, with its contents revealed for you to verify. If they do not match your cast intention, please contact an election official.

help.title: Help Using the Ballot Tracker
help.info: Have questions? We are here to help.

logs.title: Election Logs
logs.intro: These are all the election events in reverse chronological order. This allows you to publicly audit the election.
logs.download_button: Download the full election activity log (json)

info.title: Ballot found
info.description: See the status of your ballot below. You can also see all activity connected to your ballot tracking code.

pending.title: Ballot received
pending.description: Your ballot package has been received. Check back to verify that your ballot was accepted for counting.

accepted.title: Ballot accepted
accepted.description: Your signature affidavit has been verified and your ballot is accepted for counting.

rejected.title: Ballot not accepted
rejected.description: There is a problem with your signature affidavit. Contact your local election official for next steps and to cure your affidavit.

extracted.title: Ballot decrypted for tallying
extracted.description: Your ballot has been extracted from the digital ballot box and decrypted offline. It has been printed onto a paper ballot for scanning and tabulation with other absentee ballots.

welcome.footer: Did you mean Ballot Check instead?
welcome.footer_tooltip: A ballot check is performed before you submit your ballot. It enables you to confirm your ballot was recorded and encrypted correctly.
welcome.locate_tracking_code: Where do I find my tracking code?
welcome.locate_tracking_code_tooltip: Your ballot tracking code was displayed in the VoteHub app after you submitted your ballot. It was also sent to the email address in your voter registration record. Can't find your code? You can re-open the VoteHub app and enter your identifying information to retrieve the Tracking Code.
welcome.locate_verification_code: Where do I find my verification code?
welcome.locate_verification_code_tooltip: Your verification code was displayed in the VoteHub app after you submitted your ballot. It was also sent to the email address in your voter registration record.

verify.p1: I want to verify that my vote is intact and unchanged
verify.p2: I have a verification code, and I want to ensure that my digital vote has not been altered while in transit

about.p1: I have voted and I want to track my ballot.
about.p2: To check the status of your ballot, you need to input the tracking code from the Voter receipt.
